\section{Upper bound on the size-Ramsey number of $P_n$}\label{sec3}

In this section, we present various upper bounds on ${\hat{R}({{P_n}})}$. Corresponding theorems use different approaches and different probability spaces. Subsection~\ref{subsec:Letzter} uses the existing lemma of Letzter. In Subsection~\ref{subsec:two_wholes}, another improvement is developed, which gives the strongest bound. Finally, Subsection~\ref{subsec:multi} deals with more colours.

\smallskip
